citation.excerpt: Detecting and recognizing text in natural scene images. This is still an open problem for research community and has many usge like image-based machine translation, autonomous cars or image/video indexing. The Algorithm consist of two stages which are 1.Text Dectection 2.Text Recognition stages. The Text Dection stage uses Resnet-Cifar version of Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition ("https://arxiv.org/abs/1512.03385") and Spatial Transformer Network by Max Jaderberg ("https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.02025").The Text Detection and Recognition Stage again contains a variant Resnet-cifar version.The whole model is trained end-to-end.

description.excerpt:
• main.py script creates the whole model consiting of localisation network, Grid generator and sampler and Recognition network.
• stn_network.py script crates spatial transformer network, Grid genrator and bilinearsampler.
• resnet_stn.py script creates detection and recognition resnet network as proposed by the author.

Detecting and recognizing text in natural scene images. This is still an open problem for research community and has many usge like image-based machine translation, autonomous cars or image/video indexing. The Algorithm consist of two stages which are 1.Text Dectection 2.Text Recognition stages. The Text Dection stage uses Resnet-Cifar version of Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition ("https://arxiv.org/abs/1512.03385") and Spatial Transformer Network by Max Jaderberg ("https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.02025").The Text Detection and Recognition Stage again contains a variant Resnet-cifar version.The whole model is trained end-to-end.
Implementation of "STN-OCR: A single Neural Network for Text Detection and Text Recognition"  in natural Scenes by Christian Bartz.
